data.comment: There are 42191 people in the crowd for today's match.
The big names in today's match at Gazprom Arena have now been confirmed.
St. Petersburg kick-off to get the first-half underway.
Aleksei Vasilevich Sukhoi signals a free kick to St. Petersburg.
Corner awarded to St. Petersburg.
Ball goes out of play for a St. Petersburg goal kick.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Aleksei Vasilevich Sukhoi signals a St. Petersburg throw-in in Ufa's half.
Throw-in for St. Petersburg in the half of Ufa.
St. Petersburg awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Ufa are pushing forward but Azer Aliev's finish is wide of the goal.
St. Petersburg have a goal kick.
Free kick for St. Petersburg in the half of Ufa.
Can St. Petersburg get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Ufa's half?
Aleksei Vasilevich Sukhoi awards the away team a throw-in.
Ufa to take a throw-in in St. Petersburg territory.
Aleksei Vasilevich Sukhoi signals a free kick to Ufa in their own half.
In Saint Petersburg St. Petersburg attack through Yuri Zhirkov. The finish is off target, however.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Saint Petersburg.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Ufa have a dangerous throw-in.
Free kick in a good position for St. Petersburg!
St. Petersburg are coming forward and Yaroslav Rakitskiy gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Aleksei Vasilevich Sukhoi awards Ufa a goal kick.
Ufa to take a throw-in in St. Petersburg territory.
Can St. Petersburg get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Ufa's half?
St. Petersburg's Magomed Ozdoev breaks free at Gazprom Arena. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Goal kick for Ufa at Gazprom Arena.
Throw-in for Ufa at Gazprom Arena.
Throw-in for Ufa in the half of St. Petersburg.
Lovro Bizjak of Ufa gets in a strike, but is off target.
Ball goes out of play for a St. Petersburg goal kick.
Ufa awarded a free kick in their own half.
St. Petersburg's Artem Dzyuba gets in a shot on goal at Gazprom Arena. But the effort is unsuccessful.
Ufa needs to be cautious. St. Petersburg have an attacking throw-in.
Aleksei Vasilevich Sukhoi blows against St. Petersburg's Magomed Ozdoev for offside.
Throw-in for St. Petersburg in their own half.
St. Petersburg's Artem Dzyuba has run offside.
Free kick St. Petersburg.
Aleksandr Putsko (Ufa) has received a yellow card from Aleksei Vasilevich Sukhoi.
Play has been interrupted briefly in Saint Petersburg to check on Yaroslav Rakitskiy, who is grimacing with pain.
Free kick for St. Petersburg in their own half.
Yaroslav Rakitskiy is back on his feet again.
Free kick for St. Petersburg in their own half.
In Saint Petersburg a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Ufa drives forward and Lovro Bizjak gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
St. Petersburg have been awarded a corner by Aleksei Vasilevich Sukhoi.
St. Petersburg drive forward but Emiliano Rigoni is judged offside.
St. Petersburg awarded a free kick in their own half.
Aleksei Vasilevich Sukhoi awards Ufa a goal kick.
Throw-in Ufa.
Ufa's Daniil Fomin gets his shot away but it misses the target.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Saint Petersburg.
St. Petersburg surge into the attack at Gazprom Arena but Artem Dzyubaâ€™s header is off-target.
Ufa have a goal kick.
Ufa's Oston Urunov misses with an attempt on goal.
Goal kick for St. Petersburg at Gazprom Arena.
Ball safe as St. Petersburg is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Wilmar Barrios gets his shot on target but fails to score for St. Petersburg.
1 minutes will be added to the 1st half.
The first-half has come to a close in Saint Petersburg.
Lovro Bizjak (Ufa) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
Ufa kick-off the second-half u- the match is underway again!
Aleksei Vasilevich Sukhoi awards the away team a throw-in.
Sardar Azmoun is replacing Emiliano Rigoni for the home team.
Aleksei Vasilevich Sukhoi signals a St. Petersburg throw-in in Ufa's half.
Throw-in for St. Petersburg in the half of Ufa.
Aleksei Vasilevich Sukhoi signals a St. Petersburg throw-in in Ufa's half.
Free kick Ufa.
St. Petersburg's Yaroslav Rakitskiy has been booked in Saint Petersburg.
Can St. Petersburg capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Ufa's half?
St. Petersburg attack but Artem Dzyuba's header doesn't find the target.
Ball goes out of play for a Ufa goal kick.
Free kick for Ufa in the half of St. Petersburg.
Bojan Jokic for Ufa has been booked by Aleksei Vasilevich Sukhoi and receives a first yellow card.
Important block from the Ufa defence as Sardar Azmoun fires in a strike for St. Petersburg.
Aleksei Vasilevich Sukhoi signals a free kick to Ufa in their own half.
Throw-in St. Petersburg.
Corner awarded to St. Petersburg.
St. Petersburg have been awarded a corner by Aleksei Vasilevich Sukhoi.
Corner awarded to St. Petersburg.
St. Petersburg have been awarded a corner by Aleksei Vasilevich Sukhoi.
Aleksei Vasilevich Sukhoi signals a free kick to St. Petersburg.
St. Petersburg awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Ball safe as Ufa is awarded a throw-in in their half.
The match has been stopped briefly for attention to the injured Yaroslav Rakitskiy.
Yaroslav Rakitskiy returns to the field for St. Petersburg after picking up a slight injury.
Lovro Bizjak (Ufa) gets up for a header but cannot keep the ball on target.
Goal kick for St. Petersburg at Gazprom Arena.
St. Petersburg's Sardar Azmoun misses with an attempt on goal.
Aleksei Vasilevich Sukhoi awards Ufa a goal kick.
Vadim Evseev (Ufa) is making a first substitution, with Vyacheslav Krotov replacing Lovro Bizjak.
Throw-in for St. Petersburg at Gazprom Arena.
St. Petersburg have been awarded a corner by Aleksei Vasilevich Sukhoi.
Can St. Petersburg get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Ufa's half?
St. Petersburg make their second substitution with Sebastian Driussi replacing Douglas Santos.
Sardar Azmoun for St. Petersburg gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Ufa have a goal kick.
In Saint Petersburg, Yaroslav Rakitskiy of St. Petersburg is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
Aleksei Vasilevich Sukhoi signals a free kick to St. Petersburg in their own half.
In Saint Petersburg St. Petersburg attack through Magomed Ozdoev. The finish is off target, however.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Saint Petersburg.
The away team replace Oston Urunov with Olivier Thill.
In Saint Petersburg St. Petersburg drive forward through Artem Dzyuba. His shot is on target but it's saved.
Ball goes out of play for a Ufa goal kick.
Throw-in for Ufa in their own half.
Ufa to take a throw-in in St. Petersburg territory.
Throw-in St. Petersburg.
In Saint Petersburg a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Ufa pushes forward through Daniil Fomin, whose finish on goal is saved.
St. Petersburg make their third substitution with Aleksandr Yerokhin replacing Magomed Ozdoev.
Corner awarded to Ufa.
Free kick for St. Petersburg in their own half.
Wilmar Barrios (St. Petersburg) has received a first yellow card.
Ufa awarded a throw-in in their own half.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Goal kick for Ufa at Gazprom Arena.
Olivier Thill is writhing in pain and play has been suspended for a few moments.
Ufa's Olivier Thill is back in action after a slight knock.
St. Petersburg's Aleksandr Yerokhin breaks free at Gazprom Arena. But the strike goes wide of the post.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Saint Petersburg.
St. Petersburg awarded a free kick in their own half.
Aleksei Vasilevich Sukhoi signals a throw-in for St. Petersburg, close to Ufa's area.
Aleksandr Yerokhin of St. Petersburg gets in a strike, but is off target.
Aleksei Vasilevich Sukhoi awards Ufa a goal kick.
Aleksei Vasilevich Sukhoi will wait an extra 3 minutes before blowing the whistle to end the 2nd half.
Aleksei Vasilevich Sukhoi awards the home team a throw-in.
In Saint Petersburg, Artem Dzyuba (St. Petersburg) misses the target with a header.
Ufa have a goal kick.
Throw-in for St. Petersburg close to the penalty box.
Aleksei Vasilevich Sukhoi signals a free kick to Ufa in their own half.
It's 0-0 as the referee blows for full-time.
Vadim Evseev (Ufa) is making a third change, with Andres Vombergar replacing the possibly injured Olivier Thill.
Aleksei Vasilevich Sukhoi waits before resuming play because Aleksandr Belenov for Ufa is still down.
